divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from work near 144th thornton\northglenn area around 8:50 to 9:00 pm when i saw this light thing hovering. it was very bright as you can see in the video. i pulled over to the side of the road to film it, then a bunch of cars came and i didn't want to look suspicious on the side of the road so i quit filming and drove off. not sure what it was, where it went it kinda just flew off losing brightness the further away it went.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Northglenn
There were no other sightings in Northglenn on or around March 12th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I was driving around listening to music when I saw this light.
